name: VirusRush + Hazard of the Ages
summary: Face powerful bosses in a soulslike challenge amidst bullet hell! Each one will test your adaptability, skills, and strategic thinking, as you are fragile and will need to manage your stamina to dodge with your dash amidst intense, fast-paced action! To progress, you don't just need to defeat them but also master the combats to achieve the best rankings and obtain the stars needed to unlock more battles.
